info.name: Shrink New Tab Thumbnails - Firefox
info.description: Displays 5 x 3 tiles on Firefox 42, at least on my system
info.additionalInfo: Updated 11/21/2015 to remove more whitespace around elements so tiles can be a bit larger and better fit three rows of five.

obsolete.message: Changes to the new tab page have rendered this style obsolete. Also, you would need to use userContent.css.
